lines.text: Relationship can be described as y = mx + b

secText:
Lesson:
1. Identify the graphs and equations of [OBJ:expsec_c354:linear and proportional relationships].
2. Identify the graph and equations of [OBJ:expsec_c35812:inversely proportional and nonlinear relationships].
3. Discuss [OBJ:expsec_c356:examples of rates], and calculate the rate of a graph.
4. Describe [OBJ:expsec_c357:rates by analyzing graphs].
Quick Review: [OBJ:sum_proportional_linear:Proportional and Linear Relationships], [OBJ:sum_non_linear_graphs:Nonlinear Graphs], [OBJ:sum_rates_graphs:Rates and Slopes]
